Articles.Content:
I seem to have a problem with the nuclear engines after I've captured an asteroid.. the engines no longer work..

anyone else tried this? have the same problem?
If the engines are set up to pull rather than push the thrust may be blocked by the asteroid if the engines are too close. A picture would be helpful in troubleshooting.
The Engines are set the correct way.. they just no longer work.... I've been experimenting with heat and I made sure they didn't overheat but sill nothing.
